AutoReplacement.Replacement: SELECT Name, COALESCE(PARSENAME(base_object_name, 4), @@servername) AS ServerName, COALESCE(PARSENAME(base_object_name, 3), DB_NAME(DB_ID())) AS DBName, COALESCE(PARSENAME(base_object_name, 2), SCHEMA_NAME(SCHEMA_ID())) AS SchemaName, PARSENAME(base_object_name, 1) AS objectName FROM sys.synonyms WHERE 1 = 1 AND name = '#' ORDER BY 1, 2, 3, 4, 5;
